FALTAN CASOS


```{r}

base_url = "https://ibestat.es/edatos/apis/statistical-resources/v1.0/datasets/IBESTAT/000058A_"
end_url = "/~latest.csv"



islas = c(1:13)


file_path="../../raw_data/raw_data7/"
file_name="raw_FRONTUR_flujo_turistas"
format = ".csv"

for(i in 1:13){
  tmp = sprintf("%06d", i)
  tmp_file_name = paste0(file_name,tmp,format)
  file_name_path=paste0(file_path,tmp_file_name)
  
  url = paste0(base_url,tmp,end_url)
  
  
  download.file(url, file_name_path, mode = "wb")
}
```
